channel.title: Poconos on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Poconos on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: This labor day weekend, the fam VRBOd a pretty nice woodsy property in the Poconos. It’s been years since some of us have met! The adults had some great time together just winding down while the kids literally brought the place down. The property had direct access to the Beltzville lake and almost everyone took to the water. A first of kinds…The kayaks weren’t the best maintained and a couple of us did take some falls in the water. Life jackets came in super handy! So thankful I learnt swimming early on. This weekend did bring out the outdoorsy flair from everyone.

item.title: Rafting at Poconos
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Back to the waters after a long time. I believe we covered about 12 miles in about 4.5 hours. Wasn’t as tired as I expected it to be.

Some insanely funny falls from the rafts. We almost lost our captain to the waters! Had about four Grade II and a couple of Grade III rapids. I think I’m prepared for higher grades now. Also strengthened my resolve to get a kayak this year.

Was a fabulous way to celebrate a couple of birthdays in the family. Should do this more often.

Srikanth Perinkulam
